evidence: "Measure Extinction" and badges for Python tests and coverage indicate a Python package used for scientific functionality, likely run by researchers as an application/library.
"This package is based upon the `Astropy package template`" suggests it is an astronomy-focused scientific code, directly tied to domain research (extinction measurement).
README only references GitHub (badges, template, contributors) and documentation; there is no mention of PyPI, conda, or other registries, implying distribution via the source repository.
